long_description: Written by a Hood River local,. Author: Scott Cook. Softcover; 249 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Maverick Publications; copyright 2010. Updated edition covers the local day hikes, waterfalls, scenic wonders and must-see attractions that you'll find along the Columbia River Gorge. Includes drive times from Portland and Hood River, driving directions and an indexed listing all the features of an excursion including fees, scenery, waterfalls and distance.
short_description: Written by a Hood River local, Curious Gorge is full of photos, maps and tips that showcase the special places in the Columbia River Gorge.
